Room.Name: Rosecrest Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking down Rosecrest Street, north of the Guard Barracks.
Room.LongDescription: On the north of Rosecrest Street is Darby Reynold's Shipyard, where most of the tall ships that ever sailed out of Nylandian Bay were originally built. To the south is the Oceancrest Central City Guard Barracks, where the City Guards go to relax after a long day patrolling the city and eating donuts. The entrance to the barracks is to the west.
